from: Description Elevate your knitwear collection with the Farah Navy Cable Knit Sweater, a unique piece combining classic texture with playful, refined detailing and our signature gold emblem. With its chunky knit rows and speckled yarn, thie Sage Nepped Sweater has a unique, textural look. The yarn is woven with tiny flecks of undyed cotton that appear throughout the knit, giving it a subtle, speckled appearance. This cardigan also features a raglan sleeve, a classic design where the sleeve seam runs diagonally from the collar to the underarm, providing a comfortable fit and a relaxed, casual look. The entire garment is fully fashioned, meaning it was knit and shaped to size, not cut and sewn from panels of fabric. This is a sign of high-quality craftsmanship that you can see in the continuous rib-knit texture of the sleeves that flows seamlessly into the armhole. Crew Neck Fully Fashioned Raglan Sleeve Knitted Rib Cuffs, Collar And Hem Embroidered Gold F Fit Regular Fit Designed to sit neither too tight or too baggy, offering everyday style and comfort. Composition And Care 100% Organic Cotton Nepped Fisherman Knit Machine Wash
